1. cost
    1. i$p_i = i$$t_i$ $$C = \sum_i (t_i - p_i)c_i = \sum_i t_i c_i - \sum_i ic_i $$
    2. $\sum_i ic_i$$\sum_i t_i c_i$
    3. $(t_1,t_2,\cdots,t_n)$$(k+1, k+2, \cdots, k+n)$Rearrangement Inequality
    4. $(c_1,c_2,\cdots,c_n)$$(c_{\sigma_1},c_{\sigma_2},\cdots,c_{\sigma_n})$$(k+1,k+2,\cdots,k+n)$ $$ t_{\sigma_i} = k+i $$

  2. $t_i \ge i$

    (i, ti)(4,3)34

    1. $\sum_i t_i c_i $$\sum_i i c_i$costijj < im $(m\ge i)$
    2. (j -> m)(j+1, ... , m)(i+1, ... , i+m-j)(j, ..., m-1)im
    3. mmm
      1. m1 $$\begin{aligned} \Delta(m_1) &= c_i (m_1-j) - \sum_{l=1}^{m_1-j} c_{i+l} \end{aligned}$$
      2. m1 + 1 $$\begin{aligned} \Delta(m_1+1) &= c_i (m_1+1-j) - \sum_{l=1}^{m_1+1-j} c_{i+l} \end{aligned}$$
      3. $$\begin{aligned} \Delta(m_1+1) - \Delta(m_1) = c_i - c_{i+m_1+1-j} \ge 0 \quad (c_i ) \end{aligned}$$
      4. mmi
  3. $c_i$$O(n\log n)$
